channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 20:34 Alarm lifted in Donetsk region. Follow further messages.
item.description: 🟢 20:34 Alarm lifted in Donetsk region. Follow further messages. #Donetsk_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟢 20:29 Alarm lifted in Odesa region. Follow further messages.

item.title: 🟡 20:27 Repulse of the alarm in the Kharkiv region. Please note, the alarm is still in progress in:- Kupyanskyi district- Kharkivskyi district- Lipetsk Territorial Community- Vovchan Territorial Community
item.description: 🟡 20:27 Repulse of the alarm in the Kharkiv region. Please note, the alarm is still in progress in:- Kupyanskyi district- Kharkivskyi district- Lipetsk Territorial Community- Vovchan Territorial Community#Харкивська_область This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
